name: Traffic Rider: Highway Race Light
description:
Traffic Rider: Highway Race Light is a performance optimized mode of one of the best racing games on motorcycles.

Ride your motorcycle on an endless desert highway, interstate roads or on the streets of Miami.

Be sure, this game works more faster and smoother on your device than ever before. It takes even less disk space and is more carefully to the device's battery.

At now you will start your first race on a speedy dirt-bike. Cops on this highway won’t be bored. Show them what mean the really fast ride in the hottest police pursuit game mode. Win the Time Trial racings on fastest sport motorcycles.

You still have 4 different game modes in the 3 amazing locations! And also several best types of motorcycles.

Have fun, racers!
